thread.title: Pittsburgh Steelers vs. Baltimore Ravens: Live updates from Thursday Night Football
thread.title_full: Pittsburgh Steelers vs. Baltimore Ravens: Live updates from Thursday Night Football | OregonLive.com

author: JD Humburg | The Oregonian/OregonLive
title: Pittsburgh Steelers vs. Baltimore Ravens: Live updates from Thursday Night Football
text:
The winless Baltimore Ravens kick off Week 4 of the 2015 NFL season with a trip to face the Pittsburgh Steelers for a prime time matchup on Thursday Night Football. Kickoff is at 5:25 p.m.
More : Complete Week 4 schedule, scoreboard and stats
Follow along as we bring you live updates and analysis from the game from kickoff through the final whistle in the comments section below. Have thoughts on how the Ravens or Steelers are performing? Don't hesitate to jump in on the live updates and chat with us as the game rolls along.
